oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in several hands, in one column, 23-24 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Author's name is not given in the text.

Bound with: Tuḥfat al-silāk fī faḍl al-siwāk / Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī (ff. 1r-6v) -- Kitāb shurūṭ al-imāmah / Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī (ff. 7r-9v).
MS Arab SM4178. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
